description: This file defines several marshmallow schemas for serializing and deserializing note data, including creation, update, listing, and detailed representation schemas.

classes.name: NoteCreateSchema
classes.description: Schema for creating a note with optional title and content fields.

classes.name: NoteUpdateSchema
classes.description: Schema for updating a note with optional fields, including an archived status.

classes.name: NoteSchema
classes.description: Schema representing a complete Note entity, including ID, timestamps, and archived status.

classes.name: NotesListQuerySchema
classes.description: Schema for query parameters used to filter and retrieve notes, including a search query and archived filter.

ctags.name: archived
ctags.pattern: /^    archived = fields.Boolean(required=True, description="Whether the note is archived")$/

ctags.name: content
ctags.pattern: /^    content = fields.String(required=False, allow_none=True, description="Content\/body of the n/

ctags.name: created_at

ctags.name: include_archived

ctags.name: q
ctags.pattern: /^    q = fields.String(required=False, allow_none=True, description="Search query to match in tit/

ctags.name: title
ctags.pattern: /^    title = fields.String(required=True, description="Title of the note")$/

ctags.name: updated_at
ctags.pattern: /^    updated_at = fields.String(required=True, description="ISO8601 timestamp when last updated (/
